name: CoHMM
shortdesc: A proxy application for the Heterogeneous Multiscale Method (HMM) augmented with adaptive sampling.
longdesc: A Co-design proxy application for the Heterogeneous Multiscale Method (HMM) augmented with adaptive sampling. This source code was used to generate the data in the paper: B. Rouet-Leduc et al., Spatial adaptive sampling in multiscale simulation, Comput. Phys. Commun. 185 (2014) 1857-1864 (link).Original authors of the source code include Bertrand Rouet-Leduc and the students of the 2013 Los Alamos Co-Design Summer School. CoHMM is now maintained by ExMatEx: Exascale Co-Design Center for Materials in Extreme Environments (exmatex.org).
